Headline: #3 King DriveTemporary Northbound Reroute near King Drive/Marquette
ShortDescription: Northbound 3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Dr., 69th, Rhodes and South Chicago: due to,street blockage near King Drive/Marquette.

FullDescription.#cdata-section:
Northbound #3 King Drive buses are temporarily rerouted via King Dr., 69th, Rhodes and South Chicago: due to,street blockage near King Drive/Marquette.

Southbound buses are not affected.

Allow extra travel time.
